Question: This person was host of the Academy Awards ceremony fourteen times between 1939 and 1977.
Hints: He hosted their Lights On telecast in 1960 and donated $100,000 to establish the ____ Fight for Sight Fund.
This person was an avid golfer, playing in as many as 150 charity tournaments a year.
This person was born in Eltham, London, UK, the fifth of seven sons.
